snippet.title: SAMPLE TEXTURE NODE! #136 | Blender.Today LIVE
snippet.description:
ASSET BROWSER
Asset Browser: Support dragging image assets into node editors https://developer.blender.org/rBdb15df0baaad0d7ddedbae86b76ebcb342b14616  
Asset Browser: Support dragging mask assets into compositors https://developer.blender.org/rBb449da3a7d4836362a720a0072fad3e0a02f185a   

UI
UI: Object "Make Links" sub-menu overhaul https://developer.blender.org/rB685419d6bebfec1542ecbe8c3542baba88132604 
UI: particle tool properties layout tweaks https://developer.blender.org/rBeb45e7be47f7ab0a37f869bf1d12e6cee10b24b8 
UI: Transform Arrow Cursor Refactor https://developer.blender.org/D9668 
UI: Viewport Navigate Gizmo Refactor https://developer.blender.org/D9744 
UI: Gizmo Tooltip Positions https://developer.blender.org/D9793 
UI: move 'Trace Image to Grease Pencil' to 'Convert' sub-menu https://developer.blender.org/rB5a1cef2e763f70230259433423cd33a644e46218 

GEOMETRY NODES
2.92 - Geometry Nodes - Object Info: option to apply obj transform to the geometry https://developer.blender.org/rB8b777ee6d69d4805c64756cf6a33db894160ce29 
Geometry Nodes: initial support for volumes https://developer.blender.org/rB793547e7d1401ad545e0450b80c7bafd521c60e1 
Geometry Nodes: new Attribute Sample Texture node https://developer.blender.org/rB425e706921a8f986921b8b9c429874fed98e9a10 

CYCLES
Cycles: internal support for the concept of procedurals https://developer.blender.org/rB2e67191c861f2cb148f05af116114e7332b8e789 
Cycles: internal support for Alembic procedurals https://developer.blender.org/rBb64f0fab068169a7c379be728aae8994eb893b18 

GPENCIL
GPencil Tools: Add viewport timeline scrub feature https://developer.blender.org/rBA76fba3f84b6fdcc350d232eb740c0cd72ac9ffb7
GPencil: New option to trace current frame https://developer.blender.org/rBe747c07156cce226dde25309b4346f8354103a24 

VSE
VSE: Inherit blend mode with single input effects https://developer.blender.org/rBd6bbcc4f666b257fed3e6f8ec468d0efff5b591f 

--

snippet.title: LAST BLENDER TODAY ü•≥ BlenderToday #109
snippet.description:
This is the last Blender Today as we know it. We'll be restructuring the show starting next week. To go with a bang we have EEVEE updates, Cycles performance, MODELING things wanted for ever, Vertex Painting, overall performance and so much more. Crazy day today.
